verses.name: Amos 3:5
verses.text: Can a bird fall in a snare upon the earth, where no gin is for him? shall one take up a snare from the earth, and have taken nothing at all?

verses.name: Amos 3:6
verses.text: Shall a trumpet be blown in the city, and the people not be afraid? shall there be evil in a city, and the Lord hath not done it?

verses.name: Amos 3:7
verses.text: Surely the Lord God will do nothing, but he revealeth his secret unto his servants the prophets.

verses.name: Amos 3:8
verses.text: The lion hath roared, who will not fear? the Lord God hath spoken, who can but prophesy?
